! <<lingo Name>>

<<lingo Description>>

!! Usage

# Tiddlers with tags `$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Gauge` are recognized by the statistical chart plugin and put into the dashboard.
## This plugin comes with several such tiddlers, just fill in the tags to be tracked in the settings to use them. They will also remind you to fill them in the dashboard if you forget to do so.
## You can also disable these preset tiddlers in the settings. To disable, either put the `enabled: no` field on the tiddler, or click the `disable` button below the tiddler.
# Clicking on the Add button ({{$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/ButtonOpenCreateGaugeModal}}) in the Calendar Dashboard layout opens a modal to quickly create a new visual dashboard.
## The gauges available in the modal are from the plugin's pre-built templates, and more gauge templates will be available as the plugin is updated.
## Each gauge created via the modal is a note tiddler in your wiki, and you can open the tiddler later to freely modify its content.

!! Developing new gauges

## Refer to the [[Calendar Plugin Official Wiki|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tiddlywiki-calendar/]] for fields related to the Calendar Plugin.
# See [[ECharts Plugin Official Wiki|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-echarts/]] for ECharts visualization-related Widgets.

lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/

! <<lingo Name>>

<<lingo Description>>

!! 用法

# 带有 `$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Gauge` 标签的条目会被统计图表插件识别，放入仪表盘。
## 本插件自带几个这样的条目，只需要在设置里填写要追踪的标签即可使用。如果忘了填写，它们也会在仪表盘里提醒你填写。
## 你也可以在设置里禁用这些预置的条目。禁用即给条目带上 `enabled: no` 字段，或点击条目下方的「禁用」按钮。
# 点击「日历仪表盘」布局里的添加按钮（{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/ButtonOpenCreateGaugeModal}}），可以打开对话框，快速创建新的可视化仪表。
## 对话框里可选的仪表来自本插件预置的模板，随着本插件更新会有更多仪表模板可选。
## 通过对话框创建的每个仪表，都是你知识库里的一个笔记条目，你可以随后打开条目自由修改其内容。

!! 开发新仪表

# 参阅[[日历插件官方知识库|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tiddlywiki-calendar/]]，了解日历插件相关的字段。
# 参阅[[ECharts 插件官方知识库|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-echarts/]]，了解 ECharts 可视化相关的微件。
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Name","text":"可视化大屏"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Description","text":"在仪表盘上显示日历和知识库里事件的仪表和统计图表。提供基于 \define draft-tiddler() $:/temp/visualization-dashboard/new-gauge

<$button class="button-open-create-gauge-modal-open-create-modal-button">
  <!-- Cleanup the draft state before open modal -->
  <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<draft-tiddler>> $overwrite="yes" enabled="yes">
    <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/CreateGaugeModal"/>
  </$action-createtiddler>
  <<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Button/Open/Caption>> {{$:/core/images/new-button}}
</$button>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/CreateGaugeModal":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/CreateGaugeModal","subtitle":"<<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Caption $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","footer":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/CreateGaugeModalFooter}}","text":"\import [[$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags]]
\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/
\define draft-tiddler() $:/temp/visualization-dashboard/new-gauge
\procedure option-item()
  <option value={{!!title}} class='new-gauge-select-option'>
    <span class='new-gauge-select-option-caption'>{{!!caption}}</span>
    <span class='new-gauge-select-option-separator'>-</span>
    <span class='new-gauge-select-option-description'>{{!!description}}</span>
  </option>
\end

\define conditional-field(fieldName, fieldType:"text")
  <% if [<draft-tiddler>has[$fieldName$]] %>
    <div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
      <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/$fieldName$/Caption>></span>
      <$edit-text tag=input type="$fieldType$" tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> field="$fieldName$" class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-input"/>
      <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/$fieldName$/Description>></span>
    </div>
  <% endif %>
\end
\define conditional-field-tag-picker(fieldName)
  <% if [<draft-tiddler>has:field[$fieldName$]] %>
    <div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
      <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/$fieldName$/Caption>></span>
      <$let currentTiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> saveTiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> tagField="$fieldName$" newTagNameTiddler=<<qualify "$:/temp/NewTagName">>>
        {{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags}}
      </$let>
      <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/$fieldName$/Description>></span>
    </div>
  <% endif %>
\end

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
  <!-- Apply the template to draft state, but remove the `tags`, and add `enabled` fields -->
  <$select
    tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>>
    field='template'
    class='new-gauge-select'
    actions='
      <$action-createtiddler
        $basetitle=<<draft-tiddler>>
        $overwrite="yes"
        $template={{{[<draft-tiddler>get[template]]}}}
        template={{{[<draft-tiddler>get[template]]}}}
      >
        <$action-setfield
          $tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>>
          enabled="yes"
          tags=""
          caption=""
          description=""
        />
      </$action-createtiddler>
    '
  >
    <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/GaugeTemplateGroup]]' variable='groupName'>
      <$wikify name='groupCaption' text={{{ [<groupName>get[caption]] }}}>
      <optgroup label=<<groupCaption>>>
        <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/GaugeTemplate]tag<groupName>]'>
          <<option-item>>
        </$list>
      </optgroup>
      </$wikify>
    </$list>
    <$wikify name='groupCaption' text='<<lingo GaugeTemplateGroup/Others/Caption>>'>
      <optgroup label=<<groupCaption>>>
        <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/GaugeTemplate]notHaveGroupTag[]]'>
          <<option-item>>
        </$list>
      </optgroup>
    </$wikify>
  </$select>
</div>

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-description">
  <$wikify name="description" text={{{[<draft-tiddler>get[template]get[description]]}}}>
    <<description>>
  </$wikify>
</div>

<!-- Fields that possible required by some template -->
<!-- // TODO: reflect to auto generate form use SuperTag? -->
<<conditional-field-tag-picker fieldName:targetTiddler>>

<<conditional-field targetValue fieldType:"number">>

<<conditional-field color fieldType:"color">>
<!-- End Fields -->

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Title/Caption>></span>
  <$edit-text tag=input tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> field="draft.title" class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-input"/>
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Title/Description>></span>
</div>

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Caption/Caption>></span>
  <$edit-text tag=input tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> field="caption" class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-input" placeholder={{$:/state/visualization-dashboard/newAction!!draft.title}}/>
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Caption/Description>></span>
</div>

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Description/Caption>></span>
  <$edit-text tag=input tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> field="description" class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-input"/>
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Description/Description>></span>
</div>

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Icon/Caption>></span>
  <$edit-text tag=input tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> field="icon" class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-input"/>
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Icon/Description>></span>
</div>

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Tags/Caption>></span>
  <$let currentTiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> saveTiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> tagField="tags" newTagNameTiddler=<<qualify "$:/temp/NewTagName">>>
    {{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags}}
  </$let>
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Tags/Description>></span>
</div>

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-two-column">
  <div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
    <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/grid-column-span/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input type="number" default="1" tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> field="grid-column-span" class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-input"/>
    <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/grid-column-span/Description>></span>
  </div>
  <div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
    <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/grid-row-span/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input type="number" default="1" tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> field="grid-row-span" class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-input"/>
    <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/grid-row-span/Description>></span>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field">
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Enabled/Caption>></span>
  <$checkbox
    tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>>
    field="enabled"
    checked="yes"
    unchecked="no"
    class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-input"
  />
  <span class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description"><<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Enabled/Description>></span>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/CreateGaugeModalFooter":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/CreateGaugeModalFooter","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/
\define draft-tiddler() $:/temp/visualization-dashboard/new-gauge
\define cleanUpAction()
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<draft-tiddler>> />
\end

<!-- learn this from twMat https://groups.google.com/g/tiddlywiki/c/XXbzgRmcXF0 -->
<$wikify name="newtitle" text="{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-calendar/settings/prefix}}{{$:/state/VisualizationDashboard/create-gauge-tiddler!!draft.title}}" >

<div class="visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-modal-buttons">
  <$button message="tm-close-tiddler">
    <<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Button/Cancel/Caption>>
    <<cleanUpAction>>
  </$button>
  
  <$button
    message="tm-close-tiddler"
    disabled={{{ [<draft-tiddler>get[draft.title]else[yes]] }}}
  >
    <<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Button/Create/Caption>>
    <$action-createtiddler
      $basetitle={{{ [<draft-tiddler>get[draft.title]] }}}
      $template=<<draft-tiddler>>
    >
      <$action-listops $tiddler=<<createTiddler-title>>  $tags="$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Gauge"/>
      <<cleanUpAction>>
      <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<<createTiddler-title>> draft.title draft.of/>
    </$action-createtiddler>
    <<cleanUpAction>>
  </$button>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/CreateGaugeModalGauge":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/CreateGaugeModalGauge","tags":"$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Gauge","caption":"<<lingo Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Caption $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/
\procedure back-to-default-layout()
<$button class="button-open-create-gauge-modal-back-to-default-layout">
  <<lingo VisualizationDashboardLayout/Exit>> {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-calendar/Images/ExitLayout}}
  <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/layout" text="" />
</$button>
\end

<div class="button-open-create-gauge-modal-container">
  <<back-to-default-layout>>

  {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/ButtonOpenCreateGaugeModal}}

  <p><<lingo VisualizationDashboardLayout/ExistingGaugesCount>>: <$text text={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Gauge]count[]] }}} /></p>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/style.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/style.css","text":"div.button-open-create-gauge-modal-container{display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex:1}div.button-open-create-gauge-modal-container p{font-size:1.5em;text-align:center}div.button-open-create-gauge-modal-container>button.button-open-create-gauge-modal-open-create-modal-button{padding:2em;font-size:2em;margin:15px}div.button-open-create-gauge-modal-container>button.button-open-create-gauge-modal-back-to-default-layout{padding:1em;font-size:2em;margin:15px}.new-gauge-select-option{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.new-gauge-select-option-caption{margin-bottom:5px}.new-gauge-select-option-separator{margin:0 3px}.visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-container{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field{display:flex;flex:1;flex-direction:column;margin-bottom:1em}.visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-label{font-size:1.1em}.visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-description{font-size:.7em}.visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-two-column{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:flex-start}.visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-two-column .visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field{padding-left:10px;padding-right:10px}.visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-two-column .visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field:first-child{padding-left:0}.visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field-two-column .visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-field:last-child{padding-right:0}.visualization-dashboard-new-gauge-modal-buttons{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;width:100%}","type":"text/css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/GaugeListItem":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/GaugeListItem","text":"\procedure list-item()
<$draggable tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> tag="h3" class="visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-item-title" >
	<% if [all[current]has[caption]] %>
		<$transclude field="caption"/>
	<% else %>
		<$view field="title"/>
	<% endif %>
</$draggable>
<div class="visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-item-body">
	<$transclude field="text" mode="block"/>
</div>
\end list-item
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/VisualizationDashboardLayout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/VisualizationDashboardLayout","name":"<<lingo VisualizationDashboardLayout/Caption $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","description":"<<lingo VisualizationDashboardLayout/Description $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","tags":"$:/tags/Layout","icon":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Icon/VisualizationDashboard","text":"\whitespace trim
\define containerClasses()
tc-page-container tc-page-view-$(storyviewTitle)$ tc-language-$(languageTitle)$ visualization-dashboard-layout-container
\end
\import [subfilter{$:/core/config/GlobalImportFilter}]
\import [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/GaugeListItem]]

\procedure list-grid-draggable-drop-actions()
<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable-drop-actions" tag="$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Gauge"/>
\end

<div class=<<containerClasses>>>
	<main class="visualization-dashboard-layout-main-area">
		<div class="visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-list-container">
			<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Gauge]!is[draft]]">
				<$droppable
					actions=<<list-grid-draggable-drop-actions>>
					tag="div"
					class="visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-item-container"
					style.grid-column=`span ${[{!!grid-column-span}]}$`
					style.grid-row=`span ${[{!!grid-row-span}]}$`
					enable=<<tv-enable-drag-and-drop>>
				>
					<<list-item>>
				</$droppable>
			</$list>
		</div>
	</main>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/style.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/style.css","text":"div.tc-page-container.visualization-dashboard-layout-container{margin-top:0;height:100vh;width:100%}.visualization-dashboard-layout-main-area{height:100%;width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.visualization-dashboard-draggable-region{cursor:grab;-webkit-app-region:drag}.visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-list-container{display:grid;grid-column-gap:10px;grid-auto-rows:415px}.visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-item-container{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:flex-start;align-items:center}.visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-item-title{margin-top:0;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-item-body{display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex:5;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin-top:1em;width:100%}.visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-item-body>p{width:100%;height:100%;margin:0}","type":"text/css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/style.variable.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/style.variable.css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\import [[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base]]
\rules except horizrule dash

@media (min-width: <<sidebarbreakpoint>>) {
  .visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-list-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  }
  .visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-item-container {
    /* Desktop Default width-height that will be overwrite by field on tiddler */
  }
}
@media (max-width: <<sidebarbreakpoint>>) {
  .visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-list-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
  .visualization-dashboard-layout-gauge-item-container {
    /* Mobile Default width-height that will be overwrite by field on tiddler */
  }
}"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Template/BarTagDaysWeek":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Template/BarTagDaysWeek","tags":"$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/GaugeTemplate $:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/BarChart","caption":"<<lingo GaugeTemplate/BarTagDaysWeek/Caption $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","description":"<<lingo GaugeTemplate/BarTagDaysWeek/Description $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","targetTiddler":"","color":"#66ccff","text":"\function dayStartDate() [daystart[],<dayIndex>]
\function dayEndDate() [dayend[],<dayIndex>]
\function hoursToday()
  [all[tiddlers]field:calendarEntry[yes]in-tagtree-of:inclusive{!!targetTiddler}] :filter[get[startDate]compare:date:gteq<dayStartDate>compare:date:lteq<dayEndDate>] +[count[]]
\end
\function color() [{!!targetTiddler}get[color]else{!!color}]

\procedure series()
[
  <$list filter="[range[7]]" variable="dayIndex">
    <<hoursToday>>,
  </$list>
]
\end

<div style="display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;width:100%;">
  <$wikify name="seriesText" text=<<series>>>
    <$echarts $text=```
      option = {
        series: [
          {
            data: $(seriesText)$,
            type: 'bar'
          }
        ],
        title: {
          text: '${[{!!description}]}$'
        },
        color: '$(color)$',
        xAxis: {
          type: 'category',
          data: ['Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat', 'Sun']
        },
        yAxis: {
          type: 'value',
          minInterval: 1,
        },
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'axis',
          axisPointer: {
            type: 'shadow'
          }
        },
      };
    ```/>
  </$wikify>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Template/CountDownDays":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Template/CountDownDays","tags":"$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/GaugeTemplate $:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Number","caption":"<<lingo GaugeTemplate/CountDownDays/Caption $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","description":"<<lingo GaugeTemplate/CountDownDays/Description $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","targetTiddler":"","targetValue":"30","color":"#66ccff","text":"\function days() [{!!targetTiddler}!daysbetween[]]
\function dayPercentage() [<days>divide{!!targetValue}multiply[100]floor[]]
\function color() [{!!targetTiddler}get[color]else{!!color}]
\function dateString() [{!!targetTiddler}get[endDate]] :else[{!!targetTiddler}get[startDate]] +[format:date[YYYY MMM DD]]

<div style="display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;width:100%;">

  <$echarts $text=```
  option = {
    series: [
      {
        data: [{
          value: $(dayPercentage)$,
          name: '$(days)$',
          title: {
            offsetCenter: ['0%', '-10%'],
            fontSize: 30,
          },
          detail: {
            valueAnimation: true,
            offsetCenter: ['0%', '30%'],
          },
        }],
        type: 'gauge',
        startAngle: 90,
        endAngle: -270,
        pointer: {
          show: false
        },
        progress: {
          show: true,
          overlap: false,
          roundCap: true,
          clip: false,
          itemStyle: {
            borderWidth: 1,
            borderColor: '$(color)$',
            color: '$(color)$',
          },
        },
        axisLine: {
          lineStyle: {
            width: 40
          }
        },
        splitLine: {
          show: false,
          distance: 0,
          length: 10
        },
        axisTick: {
          show: false
        },
        axisLabel: {
          show: false,
          distance: 50
        },
        title: {
          fontSize: 14
        },
        detail: {
          width: 50,
          height: 14,
          fontSize: 14,
          color: 'inherit',
          borderColor: 'inherit',
          borderRadius: 20,
          borderWidth: 1,
          formatter: '{value}%'
        }
      }
    ]
  };
  ```/>

  !!! {{!!description}}

  !! <<dateString>>

</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Template/CountDownNearestTagHours":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Template/CountDownNearestTagHours","tags":"$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/GaugeTemplate $:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Number","caption":"<<lingo GaugeTemplate/CountDownNearestTagHours/Caption $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","description":"<<lingo GaugeTemplate/CountDownNearestTagHours/Description $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/>>","targetTiddler":"","targetValue":"24","color":"blue","text":"\define compare-dates() [get[startDate]else[19700101]]
